orig_text: E-status[X] is success and (T0 - E-last-response[X]) < persistence.
correct_text: E-status[X] is success and (T0 - E-last-response[X]) < E-persistence.
notes: The formula should reference the persistence value for the protocol in use.

orig_text:
*  E-status[X] is either fail or timeout and (T0 - E-completed[X]) >
      damping, or
correct_text:
*  E-status[X] is either fail or timeout and (T0 - E-completed[X]) >
      E-damping, or
notes: The formula should reference the damping value for the protocol in use.
